hopobject.name: BE-Wear
hopobject.pname: Wearable device using the Beagle Bone boards
hopobject.body:
A wearable computer based around the Beagle Bone with built in inertial navigation sensor with a integrated display and a self contained power source. Targeted capability include a voice command, location awareness, optional internet connectivity, video/image capture, and wireless sensor interfacing. Features will leverage as much of the SoC on the Beagle Bone as possible using a minimal hardware addition.

This project will encompass both hardware additions and software.
hopobject.shortdesc: Wearable computer based on the Beagle Bone.
